definition: to store/to save/to have in reserve/heir/Taiwan pr. [chu2]
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Under normal circumstances, the option for the displacement capacity of 20% of the gas tank.
sentences.chinese: 一般情況下，可選擇容量爲排氣量20%的儲氣罐。

sentences.english: An emergency relief valve is arranged on the air reservoir or the wind pipe connected with the air reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 儲氣罐或連接儲氣罐的風管還配裝有安全閥。

sentences.english: An emergency relief valve is arranged on the air reservoir or the wind pipe connected with the air reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 儲氣罐或連接儲氣罐的風管還配裝有安全閥。

sentences.english: To avoid damage attach pressure accumulator to existing components.
sentences.chinese: 若要避免損壞，請將儲氣罐連接到現有部件。

sentences.english: The air tank can act as a buffer for air supply of compressor to ensure stable external supply.
sentences.chinese: 儲氣罐可以緩衝空壓機的供氣，保證對外供氣的穩定。

sentences.english: Increasing the volume of tank can also improve the oxygen purity.
sentences.chinese: 增加儲氣罐的體積有利於提高氧含量。
